channel.title: Java window
channel.description:
Well i just relised i don't know shit about java besides Server wise.. so this is my question
How do i make a window in java im using eclipse and jgrasp Like you know how mopar's client is How to make a window like that just a plain window thats java...
Flame away..

item.title: Java window
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[code]import javax.swing.JFrame;

public class Main {

public static void main(String[] args) {
    JFrame frame = new JFrame("Title"); /*Create a frame with the title "Title" */
    frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE); /*This is so the window closes when user clicks on the the X*/
    frame.setSize(500, 500); /*Create a frame of 500x500*/
    frame.setVisible(true); /*Set the frame visible*/
}

}[/code]

seriously though, its of your best interest to read some tutorials on sun’s site, and look at some documentation

ps post your questions in the fucking java section

Read full topic
